overview:
Atif Nazir is a PhD candidate at UC Davis and an avid social game/social utility development enthusiast with various successful applications under his belt.

Towards a PhD in Online Social Networks, Atif has developed and successfully grown (and sustained) various social gaming and social utility applications including Hugged and Fighters’ Club, reaching a combined user-base of 14M+ distinct users on high-profile social networks such as Facebook and Bebo, attracting more than a quarter million users daily.
